apps.name: Instasys Mail
apps.description:
Instasys Mail is a native email client for [Sandstorm](https://sandstorm.io), built with Go and HTMX. It connects directly to Sandstorm's Cap'n Proto APIs — no HTTP bridge required.

## Features

- **Inbox & Folders** — View, organise, and search your email across custom folders
- **Compose & Reply** — Rich compose form with reply, reply-all, and forward support
- **Attachments** — Upload, download, and inline-view attachments
- **Drafts** — Auto-save and manually save drafts; resume editing anytime
- **Search** — Full-text search across all messages
- **Star & Organise** — Star important messages, move between folders, bulk delete
- **Real-time Updates** — WebSocket push for new mail notifications
- **Role-based Access** — Sandstorm sharing with viewer, editor, and admin roles
- **Lightweight** — Single static binary, SQLite storage, zero external dependencies

## How It Works

Each Sandstorm grain is an independent mailbox. Email arrives via Sandstorm's built-in SMTP gateway and is stored locally in SQLite. The UI is server-rendered HTML with HTMX for seamless partial updates — no JavaScript framework required.

## Technical Details

- **Backend:** Go with native Cap'n Proto RPC (no sandstorm-http-bridge)
- **Frontend:** Server-side HTML + HTMX + WebSocket
- **Storage:** SQLite with automatic migrations
- **Binary:** Statically linked, runs inside the Sandstorm grain sandbox
